code: import React from"react";import{BrowserRouter as Router,Switch,Route,Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./MenuItems.css";function getMenuLink(menuCase){if(menuCase==="Startseite")return'/';else if(menuCase==="Über Mich")return'/AboutMe';else return'/'+menuCase;}function MenuItems(props){var menuLink=getMenuLink(props.title);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:menuLink,className:"menu-items__item",onClick:props.click},props.title));}export default MenuItems;
